name: Legend of the Chaos Mage 2.0
description:
Made by: Joakim Blomqvist, Johan Lindberg, Johan Blomqvist

All music is copyright free.

The updated version of our brackeys game jam project. We had some free time so for fun we added ultimates, more spells and enemies. Some bug fixes and balancing changes. (Bomberman is nerfed don't worry) We also made it a bit easier :)

Thanks for the feedback on the game jam. Hope you enjoy.
